#!/bin/bash
PNAME=$SCHEDULER_PARAM_PNAME
if [ "${PNAME}" != "" ] then echo "Project Name : ${PNAME}"
mkdir -p /var/sfj/gitrepo/${PNAME}/result
cd /var/sfj/gitrepo/${PNAME} terraform destroy -var-file=sfjpara.tfvars -force | tee /var/sfj/gitrepo/${PNAME}/result/destroy.log 2>&1 else terraform destroy -var-file=sfjpara.tfvars -force fi RET=$?
if [ ${RET} -ne 0 ] then exit ${RET} fi
